title: the little thnigs in life
content:
During a conversation on #epiphany over the quickest way to open bookmarks in a new tab: 

(09: 49: 43) technomancy:  i can see that it would be useful to (say)
       hold down CTRL while you open a bookmark to open it in a new tab
(09: 49: 54) technomancy:  in fact,  that would be pretty sweet,  
       though nigh undiscoverable

  [...]

(09: 50: 09) technomancy:  whoa--it already does that!

It's really funny how often these epiphanies happen. "They should make it--oh, it does already."
